lenders.name: Sean Taylor
lenders.loan_because: I want to help rural and poor communities grow and thrive, eventually becoming integral players in the world economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a manager who oversees construction of special effects for movies and television.   We make fake dead bodies, monster and alien makeups, mechanical animals and monsters, etc.

lenders.name: André
lenders.loan_because: I believe lending is the best way to help people.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kasia
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the life of someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find jobs and also help various organizations with the hiring process.

lenders.name: Marcet and Donald
lenders.loan_because: We would like to pay it forward,
lenders.occupational_info: Work Customer Service, Finance, Collection, Tech Support, Contracts.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I love giving to others!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in fifth grade. My school is clean and safe. I do a lot of fun stuff there.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I try to do good and be just

lenders.name: melissa
lenders.loan_because: My best friend is a loaner and I want to help someone succeed in life with some help that I can financially provide.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people save money.

lenders.name: Tylee
lenders.loan_because: I can. I like that I can help someone to be successful and look after their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am about to enter the 8th grade in September 2012. I work hard at school and get good grades. I play soccer in the summer.

lenders.name: sean ( Australia )
lenders.loan_because: l believe everyone needs a chance at a better life, and to have a smile on there faces....
lenders.occupational_info: my work involves fast food in Queensland Australia

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.loan_because: I know how good it feels to receive help when you need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to feel happy and balanced in themselves, through acupuncture and psychic healing; it's a form of shamanism.

lenders.name: kylie
lenders.loan_because: Lending money through this site allows me, with little effort, to help others in big ways.Its so easy, microfinancing is so important, and why wouldn't you?

lenders.name: TamboDragonFruit
lenders.loan_because: Life without Love is not worth living.
lenders.occupational_info:
Dragon Fruit Farmer +

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I wish to make a positive difference in other people's lives and KIVA has made it so simple!

lenders.name: MGB
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is poor entrepeneurs only access to financing and it gives families a chance to do better for themselves and their children.

lenders.name: Helene
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a school that has 1200 students.

lenders.name: dslunsford1
lenders.loan_because: God has so richly blessed us that we are honored to bless others.  It's amazing to think about how much money we waste in a "developed" nation, whereas a month's worth of pocket change could revitalize someone's life.  To God be the Glory, great things He hath done.(Luke 7:41-43)
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and my wife is a doctor.

lenders.name: lucy & simon
lenders.loan_because: We love to be able to make a difference in peoples lives and we believe helping them with a business loan changes lives forever.
lenders.occupational_info: I look after our beautiful twin baby boys and Simon fixes aircraft in the Air force

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people become financially independent and I want to share some of my good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a financial services firm helping people plan and save for retirement.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Why not? :-P

lenders.name: karen
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good about myself! I have  a system where I buy other people's useless stuff in garage sales, sell it on ebay and then give all the money to Kiva. Capitalism is a vicious circle!
lenders.occupational_info: You can't eat them but flowers are very good for the soul.

lenders.name: Mandi
lenders.loan_because: because i can.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to stay connected to people and help others in need.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I want to.

lenders.loan_because:
I am a college's student in Indonesia, I need money to make a small shop, I just need $1000. Please lend me money, and I promise to you all to back your money in some month. Please contact me on my email in Yezz_2408@yahoo.com.
thanks before
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a college student who do not have much money to start entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: P.U.G.S
lenders.loan_because: We recognize that luck and circumstance have a lot to do with success and that sometimes a helping hand can be the tipping point for those in need.  We believe that it is a privilege to give and hope that our small contributions can make a lasting impact in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of girlfriends in Toronto, Canada, who like to get together to indulge as well as give back.

lenders.name: Hayley
lenders.occupational_info: If someone has an enquiry or a problem, it is my job to help them.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I want to try to help people less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: Act as a technical expert for sales people.

lenders.name: Chookie
lenders.loan_because: We are all put on earth to help each other.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: there is no reason not to

lenders.name: Gene
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help others achieve their goals and dreams.  We can do so much with small amounts of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I look for businesses listed on the stock exchange that are profitable and buy small pieces of them, hoping they will go up in value.

lenders.name: Nyree and Martin
lenders.loan_because: We are very  fortunate people and want to share what we can with those wanting to make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: kris
lenders.loan_because: I love the fact that I can reach out and help change someone's life. I value the oppurtunity to give something back to the (global) community.
lenders.occupational_info: Every year, I have the opportunity to teach hundreds of students the skills they require to be engineers. In particular, I specialize in teaching within the fields of Mechanical Engineering and Aerospace Engineering. In addition, my job allows me to conduct research into these fields.

lenders.name: Steph
lenders.loan_because: it's a little way i can help someone who doesn't have as much as i do.  I also think it is important for my sons to learn the importance of helping and giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and look after my 2 sons. I also study two days a week to be a florist. I'm hoping that by next year i will be qualified to get a good job to support my kids.

lenders.name: Juergen
lenders.loan_because: Be the change you want to see in the world
lenders.occupational_info: Commercial Lead "Allianz Global Network"

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I love

lenders.name: Shayne
lenders.loan_because: I don't loan to charities because I am never sure how much gets to the needy.  In this way I can track how my money is being put to good use and see the results first hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Government paying pension payments to the elderly.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I think this the best Idea I have ever heard of.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the elderly in their everyday living

lenders.name: carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I hope that the people I lend to will have a better life through my loan
lenders.occupational_info: beef cattle farmer

lenders.name: Joao
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference. The gap between countries and opportunities is so vast that the money we lend doesn't change our material lives in any way, but gives the opportunity for someone else to survive. That idea alone is daunting and begs the question: Why doesn't everyone who can, do it as well?
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English and Portuguese, sometimes children, sometimes adults. The passing on of knowledge is the greatest gift you can ever give, and it's free.

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: I was given a hand up when I needed it. I love the concept of using my small amount to help those who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to buy and sell houses.

lenders.name: Brennan
lenders.loan_because:
"Where you live in the world shouldn't determine whether you live".

There are people who are determined to make their lives better, we can help them and it's free!

I have the ability to give people on the other side of the world a chance to achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of making a difference to a world that is at times so harsh to some.
lenders.occupational_info: Occupational Health and safety, Keeping people safe.

lenders.name: Kerrie&Jerome
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance in life..

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software.

lenders.name: Gareth
lenders.occupational_info: Saving up to move to Tokyo

lenders.name: Mona-Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people live the lives they want, day-by-day. I hope the loans make a different in their lives in a very positive way.
lenders.occupational_info: In my job I teach people how to use their minds to create their lives and make the most out of their world. I hope I insprie a message that helps people know that anything is possible!

lenders.name: Polly
lenders.loan_because:
I think it is one of the most effective ways to alleviate poverty at a community level and empower women.

The photo is of myself and Usha Shrestha, a Kiva borrower who runs a small sweet shop selling traditional Newari deserts and Indian samosas in Nepal.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for an international NGO, Save the Children, in one of their country offices (Solomon Islands). 

I was previously based in Nepal as a Kiva Fellow.

lenders.name: Margaret Backshall Memorial Fund
lenders.loan_because: In memory of my mum Margaret who thought she didn't do anything worthwhile with her life. I loan money left to me in her will.
lenders.occupational_info: Student of Archaeology, Sydney Uni

lenders.name: Antje
lenders.loan_because: the world must become better

lenders.name: Chris Young
lenders.loan_because: I would love to be able to make a difference in people's lives and also because I'm incredibly selfish and it makes me feel good!!!
lenders.occupational_info: Just an ordinary parent that loves her family and is so appreciative to be so blessed!!!!

lenders.name: Anne & Roman
lenders.loan_because: We can potentially make a huge difference in peoples lives with such a small effort on our part
lenders.occupational_info: Roman is an electrical engineer specialising in industrial automation and Anne is a professional musician, actor and teacher.

lenders.name: Joey
lenders.loan_because: I think micro-loans are a great solution
lenders.occupational_info: I take pictures and make movies.

lenders.name: Caryn
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by people wanting to help themselves and their families live better lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with college students and help guide them through the sea of choices facing them in their academic and personal lives.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: Money makes the world go round? Well, not necessarily! But initiatives like Kiva might help to bring the world a little bit more into balance.

lenders.name: paul
lenders.loan_because: I like the concept of helping someone to help themselves.  Kiva seems to be a help up and not a hand out.  I am not against giving to charities, as I do , but this concept has the ability to make a lasting difference to someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend to emergencies, fires, incidents and medical calls.  I work in Ringwood, a suburb of Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: I can and it all leads to partnerships that create positive world change.
lenders.occupational_info: Promoting partnerships with youth and adults in my county to help create positive community change.

lenders.name: Usch
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving others a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: wife, mother and  grandmother to 12

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: Life is really great to me.  I think it is so wonderful to help someone on another continent to reach their business and financial dreams.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: Micro financing empowers entrepreneurial people. Entrepreneurs change the world in a positive way.
lenders.occupational_info: CEO at Treestle, an innovative IT company.

lenders.name: Bettina, Anna & Felix
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a perfect idea to join many people from different countries, so that they come together to help someone in a very usefull way!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a socialworker.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: People have dreams.

lenders.name: Dan and Barb
lenders.loan_because: Barb and I enjoy traveling the world and learning about other cultures.  We also enjoy helping others make a difference in their own lives and hopefully they can then reach out to others.  Spreading the wealth both monitarily and spiritually.
lenders.occupational_info: Environmental consulting

lenders.name: Aurora
lenders.loan_because: I have been on the other side. Sometimes you need help and there is no one out there. Now I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I guide women to transform their relationship to money to manifest the life they desire and deserve

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I would love to see my money going to make a difference in somebody's life.

lenders.name: Web_Imp
lenders.loan_because: Had circumstances been different, this could be me. I am thankful for what I have, and the ability to share.

lenders.name: Jess
lenders.occupational_info: I care for sick children

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: it gives people hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a production manager for t-shirts.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I care about the poor. I follow Jesus, and I believe that he's be doing the same thing that Kiva.org is.
lenders.occupational_info: I write music for films and documentaries. The latest film that my team finished exposed sex trafficking and human slavery in Cambodia.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.occupation: Health & nutrition educator, childbirth educator, doula, yoga teacher, communications professional
lenders.loan_because: -- as the song says -- "money makes the world go round!"  Also, many people have helped me in my business and personal endeavors, and I want to do the same for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I advocate for women and children's health using my public health, communications, media, fundraising, teaching and doula skills.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: Because I can. $25 is so easy to spend without even thinking about it, every day, but to other people on the other side of the globe, it means the world. I like the fact that I can help without having to rely on our government to do it on our behalf.

lenders.name: Kori
lenders.loan_because: I love the practice of micro-loans where a few dollars can have a profound impact on the quality of life of the person receiving the loan.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to get people to stop using paper processes and do those processes on line.

lenders.name: theary
lenders.loan_because:
I grew up in Cambodia and I know how hard it was after the Khmer Rouge killed most of my family members.  I still have a sister who lives in Pursat.  Twelve family members and only two survived!

God bless Cambodian people!

lenders.name: James
lenders.occupational_info: Writer

lenders.name: Tommy
lenders.loan_because: Maybe I can help
lenders.occupational_info: I sell A/C parts

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.occupation: travel agent. Want to be a painter.
lenders.loan_because: I want to help a bit. I wish I could do more.

lenders.name: Greenberg Family
lenders.loan_because: We have traveled in several under-developed countries throughout the world, and giving through kiva allows us to show our gratitude for the generosity that we have experienced in so many communities.  We also find that kiva teaches our children the joy and excitement of giving.

lenders.name: Ulrike
lenders.loan_because: I´m convinced by the idea of Kiva and because I want to share with those who need it
lenders.occupational_info: I`m working with children who need help with the german language

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I
lenders.occupational_info: I borrow money from banks for a very large corporation

lenders.name: Regine
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people without  bureaucratism. I want to give them a new chance for a better life.

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: I feel the world needs a better sense of community and responsibility and by loanning I think I can do my little part to facilitate that.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: What a strange world it is where the clicks of my laptop keys give an opportunity to others

lenders.name: Pedro
lenders.loan_because: is the obligation of every human being to help each other
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in the world of Computer Science. 
I work on a Postal Company called CTT Correios de Portugal, and my tasks go from Programming, Functional Analysis, Technical Design and Project Management.

lenders.name: Marti
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to try to raise a family as a single woman; and I know how banks treat people with no money.
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct research to find major donors for an educational institution.

lenders.name: D & B
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help others.

lenders.name: Brian N
lenders.loan_because: Being poor sucks.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand one another so they do what they meant to.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: Ich verleihe gern, weil ich dankbar bin dass es uns gut geht und ich möchte das es anderen Menschen auch so geht.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people.

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to help people in the world to make their life a little bit better!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for smaller companies consulting and helping them in all marketing matters, also building up websites and do online marketing.

lenders.name: Bill SEIDL
lenders.loan_because: Feeling concern...( )
lenders.occupational_info: ceo & founder TagsOff™ & Biotecmart™

lenders.name: Nick Boldt
lenders.loan_because: Empowerment though responsibility is much more effective than charity.
lenders.occupational_info: http://nick.divbyzero.com

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others & KIVA is a great way to do it
lenders.occupational_info: writer - speaker

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: A little bit from me can make a big difference to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I build mathematical and computer models to help people make better decisions.

lenders.name: Trent
lenders.loan_because: I like to give a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell stories and share knowledge to help others navigate life.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to support their family
lenders.occupational_info: I make photos of things people want to sell.

lenders.name: Jhambala
lenders.loan_because: Allowing people to help themselves is the best way to give!
lenders.occupational_info:
Matt works in a healthcare company developing new business opportunities.
Sacha helps people to create change in their lives through business and personal coaching.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.occupational_info: Education is power.

lenders.name: Deana
lenders.loan_because: I recall how hard it was for me to get a job after I finished school. No one would give me a job because I lacked experience, but I couldn't gain the experience because I didn't have any. I knew I was more than capable of performing the work I do now, but without being given the opportunity to do so I would not be able to prove myself. These entrepreneurs across the globe need that opportunity to prove themselves and we are here to provide the resources they lack.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because:
My friend Kristin showed me the way...

I've traveled the world extensively and have seen first hand the potential micro-loans can have on people.

lenders.name: Arlene
lenders.loan_because: It's exciting to see what other people can do with their loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze food for pesticide residues.

lenders.name: Fiona
lenders.loan_because: its a way to give back and make the world a better place in some small way

lenders.name: Anna Anthony and Oscar
lenders.loan_because: We know we are very privileged to support others, as God has supported us, and  continues to bless us.
lenders.occupational_info: Anna assists people to look and feel their very best. Anthony provides quality assurance to websites and software like this one. Oscar, our cat, supports us emotionally.

lenders.name: Audrey
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to reach many people in all parts of the globe.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I feel like it's the least that i can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently studying Philosophy with a specialization in Ethical and Moral Philosophy. Basically, I'm attempting to grasp what it means to be a responsible and good human being in our secular world. At the end of the day, I just want to be able to say that I've helped someone and that maybe, just maybe, I've made the world a better place.

lenders.name: Quoc-Anh
lenders.loan_because: microfinance works.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research and teach at a university.

lenders.name: David & Sarah
lenders.loan_because: we can, and because $25 makes such a big difference in these entrepreneurs' lives.
lenders.occupational_info: David is a family doctor. Sarah helps run the office.  We have two adult sons.

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: I believe microfinance is the future and in order to be both prosperous and sustainable we have to break down barriers between countries and all help each other.

lenders.name: Bernice
lenders.loan_because: As a single mum of 6 for the last 13 yrs I am on a limited income but still have so much more than many of these people.  Between us we sponsor 7 children through Compassion and 1 through World Vision, and this is just another way we can recognise how fortunate we are living here in Australia.  I am gradually adding to my loan amount.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in schools helping children to learn and enjoy life.  I am currently studying full time to get my Bachelor of Education as although I have working in schools for 30 years I do not have an official qualification.  I am attempting to remedy that.  I still work 3 mornings and 2 afternoons in two different schools and try to fit uni lectures and homework and housework and kids around that.  Not always successfully.

lenders.name: Doug, Jenny, K & L
lenders.loan_because: It's recyclable... and hopefully contagious!
lenders.occupational_info: I research investments and my wife is a doctor (of kids and babies)

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people succeed in fullfilling their goals. It's a great blessing to be able to be share in anothers dreams and success.
lenders.occupational_info: Basically I clean and do some driving of light rail trains which people ride on to get around our city.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is empowering

lenders.name: Jacqui
lenders.loan_because: Because I can't change the world, but I can make a big difference in  someone less fortunate's life by helping them to help themselves.

lenders.name: Perla
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help make a diference in someone's life.   I once was a struggling entrepreneur myself and know about how tough it can be.   
These people do it a lot harder than I ever did

Quiero ayudar a diferenciar en la vidas de jente. Era una vez empresario luchador mismo y sé sobre cómo es resistente puede ser. Esta gente lo hace mucho más difícilmente que lo hice antes.
lenders.occupational_info: I love life, love nature and animals and try to make a difference if I can.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: that´s a small step for a man ...
lenders.occupational_info: teach children

lenders.name: Gaby & Friedrich
lenders.loan_because: we can. This is a very good possibility for the assistence for self-helping of other, poorer people in the whole world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are married since 1976 and have two children, Kersten and Leona. We live in a small village in the "Hunsrück", a low moutain range in Germany.

lenders.name: Maree
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky in my travels to see first hand how proud and friendly people with very little are and how hard they strive to improve their lives and their families lives.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: i want to give back something

lenders.name: Magda
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people and I know when I will be need help yhey hepl me too .

lenders.name: Gitta
lenders.loan_because: I like this idea to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I´m working for ABB an I make technical drawings which shows how to build the electrical things of  powers stations all over the world

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Aidan & Dilyn
lenders.loan_because: Every week, we set aside part of our allowances to "share" with others.  We may only be 12 and 8 years old, but we like to see how we can help other people achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Jérôme
lenders.loan_because: I admire the spirit of enterprise these people have and hope that their standard of living will increase through the investments that are made possible by the loan.

lenders.name: Ganiconlo Dalman
lenders.loan_because: I make this loan because i need to help my father to help him to buy house materials he was repairing our old house and i am helping him.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a single dad and i have 3 beautiful baby girls and has a part time job just to pay our bills and send them to school. i hope someone out there has a big heart...

lenders.name: Ralph and Jenny
lenders.loan_because: Our lives have been blessed.  We want to give someone the opportunity to expand their lives, too, through the development of a successful business.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: Its great to be able to give back to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: Hectic but rewarding.

lenders.name: Maret
lenders.loan_because: I believe money should be used. To do things.

lenders.name: lisanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should deserve the right to make a go of things in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: My twin sister and I are dog groomers and we work for ourselves from home. :):) We love animals and what we do!

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an Australian charity called The Smith Family.  Our focus is on education which is the key to breaking the cycle of disadvantage in Australia as much as it's the key to breaking it overseas.

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: It gives me immense gratification to know that i'am able to make a real difference in somebody's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a University student currently studying in the area of health sciences.

lenders.name: Nacho
lenders.loan_because: The end of poverty is not only a dream

lenders.name: SiteStories: web media
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the value and power of micro-finance.
lenders.occupational_info: SiteStories creates audio and video programming for the web.  We create media for clients, and also develop original shows for syndication across the web.

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: so little to us(the equivalent of a meal out) means a phenomenal change to the lives of others
lenders.occupational_info: supporting and educating mothers to breastfeed their children

lenders.name: Catherine & Jack
lenders.loan_because: We hope our loans will make a real difference to someone's life. Love telling people about this! It's addictive..
lenders.occupational_info: We own two businesses , but the main one is to help operating businesses keep their records to show if they are operating a profit and are therefore succesful.

lenders.name: Joachin Family

lenders.occupational_info: well i do try my best to meet up except that i dont have much funds

lenders.loan_because: I like to help those who help themselves.

lenders.name: Marie

lenders.name: Bobbie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Philippe

lenders.occupational_info: I'm working on a master's degree in software engineering.

lenders.name: Kari

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because:
Is the rich world aware of how four  billion of the six billion live? If we were aware, we would want to help out, we'd want to get involved.
"Bill Gates"

Charity is a supreme virtue, and the great channel through which the mercy of God is passed on to mankind. It is the virtue that unites men and inspires their noblest efforts.
"Conrad Hilton"

lenders.name: Matt and Melissa
lenders.loan_because: We realize that we are very fortunate people and think that others should have as many opportunities as we do.
lenders.occupational_info: Matt works at a bank and Melissa works for an organization that is fighting to stop global warming.

lenders.name: Caspar
lenders.loan_because: In 2003, I had setup my own business, which I later sold after running it for eight years. Through micro-finance loans, I wish more people, particularly from developing economies, to share in the experience of building something on your own and developing it into something that can benefit your community around you.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Sales for an international Internet company, where we help to bring merchants together with their users and customers.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is not "right" to give money for nothing.  I do not want to see cycles of  dependency, but rather, cycles of responsibility, and confidence.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with organizations to build their capacities to not just grow, but to develop.  I work across sectors and take a strong stance on social responsibility.

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: There is joy in giving.
lenders.occupational_info: Consultant

lenders.name: Tarin
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Buck
lenders.loan_because: I love others and want to give to them. Luke 6:38, "Give and it shall be given unto you, good measure, pressed down, shaken together, and running over  shall men give unto your bosom.For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again."
lenders.occupational_info: I write magazine articles and books.

lenders.name: Elisabet

lenders.name: Manuel & Angelika
lenders.loan_because: We're fortunate to be able to.

lenders.name: John

lenders.name: cathleen

lenders.name: Jeanette

lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand and learn about the medications they are taking.

lenders.name: zander
lenders.loan_because: It's a good cause that helps keep me down to earth.

lenders.name: Ragagli Family

lenders.name: Anne

lenders.name: Aubrey Karen Acy Kaylan
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my opportunities and teach my girls the same.  We raise peppers in our garden and then dry, crush and bottle the blend for friends.  So many people tried to pay us for it, that we decided to donate proceeds directly to Kiva to help a fellow farmer!
lenders.occupational_info: We run a brewpub, manage 2 family rental houses, a garden and raise our 2 girls on the Outer Banks of North Carolina.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the film and television industry.

lenders.name: Kristy

lenders.name: Sallye

lenders.name: Lorane

lenders.occupational_info: I speak to the public about how to access their inner strength and to connect with spirit.

lenders.loan_because: it makes so much sense.

lenders.name: Bhargav

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.occupation: Student--Training for a MD and a JD
lenders.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurialism is a powerful force for creating meaningful and sustainable change.  Making capital both affordable and accessible to those with the drive and ideas to drive such change is key to the development of foreign economies and to the betterment of individuals' lives.  Donor aid has its place, but business drives economies and buoys lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a doctor.  Studying the law is a bit of a detour.

lenders.occupational_info: Caring for and teaching children is very rewarding and is a joy.

lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place and to help the people of the world.

lenders.name: Philipp
lenders.loan_because: I like to help.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: I can!!! I have been blessed with so many opportunities in my life, so now I can bless the lives of others in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach nursery aged children (3-4 year olds) at the American School in Japan

lenders.name: Olivero
lenders.loan_because: You can't use an old map to find new land.
lenders.occupational_info:
Whatever, a Belgium-based “intrapreneurial” company, provides a full range of tightly integrated services to information-hungry clients: workshops on searching the Web and building collective knowledge, consultancy on the safe and effective use of IT in the information era, and tools such as Knowledge Plaza, a Web-based platform that assists knowledge professionals in searching, managing, and sharing information.

123Generiques is a multi-faceted biopharmaceutical project in West Africa regrouping cultures of Artemisia annua plants (in collaboration with the UCL laboratory of pharmacognosy), a drug distribution platform and the set up of a generic pharmaceutical company.

http://www.linkedin.com/in/olivierverbeke

lenders.name: Cortney
lenders.loan_because: I love paying it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a chef who runs a very busy catering company and trains student chefs.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a casual nurse and also a property investor on the Gold Coast of Queensland, Australia.

lenders.name: jessica

lenders.occupational_info: I work as an electrician installing commercial equipment in laundries.  I work for a large American company.

lenders.name: Melissa

lenders.name: Ellie

lenders.name: Leigh & Dan
lenders.loan_because: We wish to give to those who demonstrate the drive and ambition to improve the quality of their own lives, as well as their community. We give this money in the name of Jesus Christ, who has given us the greatest gift.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: So the mechanic can fix more cars. I like cars, too.  I hope he makes a NASCAR.

lenders.name: Dina
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed in the US. I feel that to much is given much is expected and I want to share and bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to be able to stay home and raise 3 wonderful children.  I also homeschool my children which means I am their teacher and we do school  at home.

lenders.loan_because: Energy must flow

lenders.loan_because: Success has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It's what you do for others (famous quote from Danny Thomas).

lenders.loan_because: I am a citizen of this world who sees an urgency in the need to reach out and help others. There is no greater reward above that which lies in the simple act of giving.

i would like the world to be a better place,

i am a manager of a sales organization
dealing in diffrent products

lenders.loan_because: Enable people without normal banking  capability to start their own business and provide for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an entrepeneur with my own company, where we do investments and various projects within the energy sector.

lenders.loan_because: If everyone did the same we would greatly reduce poverty.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach mainly 4 year olds at a Kindergarten. I believe in empowering children to 'have-a-go', persist & master new skills thereby enabling them to gain positive dispositions to become lifelong learners - able to successfully live in a world that we cant even imagine.

lenders.name: Albert and Tarien
lenders.loan_because: We want to give something back to those who are less fortunate and we think this is an fantastic idea to help people and families to help themselves, to support them in a way which lift them up that and improves their families lives!

lenders.name: vicki
lenders.loan_because: I was once a single mum struggling to get by and now i am able to give something back and hopefully my small donation can help someone else achieve their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children ages ranging from 6mths old to school age, very enjoyable..

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected to eachother; I have arrived at a certain understanding that there is no you. there is only we.
lenders.occupational_info: transformation of consciousness

lenders.name: Seamus
lenders.loan_because: I can ... and so I should.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: I have met some wonderful people from many different cultures and would like to support people prepared to have a go.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the financial management of  local government on the beautiful island of Tasmania.

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: I like to share what I have
lenders.occupational_info: i try to attend and help people in difficult circumstances.

lenders.name: Glenno
lenders.loan_because: I live by the saying "More to all and less to none"

lenders.name: Sibelle
lenders.loan_because:
I was and am in the same boat- No money, starting my life all over again, a good idea for a small business but absolutely zero support (and this in the so called first world)- Even the business founder bank and my own bank who know my clean record over the last 25 years said: 'The sum you need is too small'. Well dammit, i did it anyway, selling personal affairs and with some people who trusted in me and gave me goods on credit (their trust was rewarded and everything paid within the month) and a hell of a lot of work day and night i got it up and running- And I know it's the same for all those people all over the world. The work needed and courage to continue, how important it is for not just your own future but a nations overall economic welfare that people can go and do something, start businesses from scratch - It's the thousands of little busily whizzing wheels of these entepreneurs that make a country GO with a capital G.
What better way to use even the small amounts of profit I am making now, than reinvest them in these humans all over the globe!
 I wish them the best of luck and.. do what i can, practically , to help make it happen. Hope you will jump on the train and invest a little income in people, not stock shares- this is the global stock of the future. Thanks xx
lenders.occupational_info: Ouff, multi tasking is the word! I design logos and websites,  write and translate texts, but also breed, buy and trade exotic winterhardy plants (Palm trees and bamboo for exmaple) With the money generated, i try to keep on working as an atist (I also write , do photography and paint) and reinvest some in projects which encourage native plants and nature ( my organisation is a member of greenpeace & Öomraan feriaan (Nature Protction and educative excursions for a Wadden Sea island) and donates every month, to name just one) well, and kiva of course!

lenders.name: KAORU
lenders.loan_because: I'm a lucky and like to make an effort to correspond to it.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a small business and one cannot survive without the support of community, be it local or global. I am blessed to have the support of family and community. As a responsible global citizen, I am proud to give back to the community and thrilled to have this opportunity to help a visionary realize their goal of starting or expanding their small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Virtual Assistant. I provide secretarial services to small businesses who either cannot afford to hire a full-time assistant, or have the space and equipment available. It is a very cost-effective option as the small business only pays for services rendered.  May I say it is an eco-friendly career. I think I fill up the tank in my car about once a month instead of twice weekly when I worked for a big company!

lenders.name: Fred & Jametta
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people while letting them be independent.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: its the right thing to do. We are called to help one another

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate for my birthday and I think this way of helping developing countries makes alot of sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I put together a community newspaper which shares community stories with the community.  I also help a wind ensemble manage their concerts and rehearsals.

lenders.name: In Memoriam
lenders.loan_because:
In Memory of members of my immediate family who have passed away : 

Father [November 2, 1900, Curacao, NA to November 1, 1972, Montreal, Quebec], 

Mother [Sept 22,1906 ~ Nijmegen, The Netherlands to July 14, 2008 ~ Quebec, Canada] and 

Eldest brother [October 5,1932, Curacao, NA -September 24, 2008, Montreal, Quebec] .

May they rest in peace.

Borrowers in these Developing Nations are above all human beings who need others to believe in them, to help them to believe in themselves and to assist them, from time to time, along their journey. 

"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall." - Nelson Mandela

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: It is a good stimulation for (starting) businesses and it helps out people who otherwise could not get a loan.
lenders.occupational_info:
I used to work in the graphic industry, together with a team we made weekly newspapers.
A few of the things I did where: creating/changing advertisements and helping on the layout of pages (the way a page looks).

In my spare time I like to read, browse the internet, listen to music and work on websites.

lenders.name: Arnt Jostein
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a very good way to help other people

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected and all riding this amazing planet together. Sharing is essential for our world family to thrive.

lenders.name: Martina
lenders.loan_because: it takes so little to make a difference

lenders.name: Kemp Family of Larkspur
lenders.loan_because:
Give someone a fish and you feed him/her for a day; teach a someone to fish and you feed him/her for a lifetime.

. Knowledge is the best charity
. to learn a lesson is a far better reward than to win a prize early in the GAME
. it is better to know how to help yourself than to beg from others

lenders.name: Laszlo
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: the word says that we will be lenders to nations and not borrowers. The thought of helping someone makes life meaningful.
lenders.occupational_info: I do route accounting and workman's compensation for our office in Charlotte, NC. I work in the textile industry.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: it makes so much sense.

lenders.name: Imaginations Ink
lenders.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." - Winston Churchill
lenders.occupational_info:
The focus of our work thus far has been two fold. Our first and main objective is to promote cultural transmission through film in hopes of fostering a better understanding of human life  and it's many complexities. 
Secondly, as we believe that we as humans will always be inseparably connected to the Earth, our goal is to illustrate environmental issues worldwide and the human toll that accompanies them.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: This is the most incredible way to give thanks for the blessings and abundance that fills my life. I am so happy to help my sisters around the world rise up and live abundantly.

lenders.name: Yung Joo
lenders.loan_because: We share this small planet.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I've been an entrepreneur for 30 years and want to help support others in developing nations.
lenders.occupational_info: We Develop Innovative Technology Solutions for the World Trade Community.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Be the change you wish to see in the world. ~ Gandhi

lenders.name: Deni
lenders.loan_because: Mohammad Yunus, Grameen Bank, is one of my favorite leaders in this world.  He proved that microfinance works to help people lift themselves out of poverty.  I am happy to have the opportunity to be a part of that process in someones life.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am working temporary jobs as an administrative assistant to support myself as I attend college.  The positions I work require basic secretarial and accounting skills.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I enjoying helping people who are striving to live a productive life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with middle school students to help them learn how to solve problems they may be experiencing.

lenders.name: Matt & Jane
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit at a computer, writing software most of the day.

lenders.occupational_info: I sell broadcast air time--radio commercials.

lenders.name: Sana

lenders.name: Lannie
lenders.loan_because: because something so simple can do so much.

lenders.name: Eagle Wings Church
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Our statement of purpose is to grow together in Christ through worship, fellowship and service.

lenders.name: Chad Anderson
lenders.loan_because: Through my travels to southern India (Tsunami Zone), Mexico, DR, and North Africa, I have come to realize how much our fellow human beings in developing countries need encouragement, hope, support, and to understand how much they truly matter.  I strongly believe that if we all do our small part to help others in need, together we can make this world a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: Pricing Analyst & Project Manager - At Better World Books, we are committed to helping provide better lives and a chance for economic, social and political freedom through literacy. We believe that good education can break the cycle of poverty. And that's why we partner with these passionate non-profit partners to make some change for the better.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: "Freely you have received, freely give" (Matthew 10:8)
